query.statement:
SELECT 'SD' AS GBN, '신규영업' AS GBN_NM , A.ATKLA , (SELECT MAX(X.ATKLT) FROM SAPHEE.TCMGT AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.SPRAS = #LANG# AND X.ATKLA = A.ATKLA) AS ATKLA_NM , A.ATNAM , (SELECT MAX(X.ATBEZ) FROM SAPHEE.CABNT AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.ATINN = A.ATINN AND X.SPRAS = #LANG# ) AS ATNAM_NM
, (SELECT CAST(X.BIGO AS VARCHAR(1500)) FROM SAPHEE.ZCSTCABN AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.GBN = #GBN# AND X.ATKLA = A.ATKLA AND X.ATNAM = A.ATNAM AND X.SPRAS = #LANG#) AS BIGO
FROM SAPHEE.CABN AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ATNAM = #ATNAM# WITH UR
